name: Memory Manager
description:
Play as a simple little computer who's only task is to take memory and move it around within an allocated time. If you fail to do so, you will cause the whole system to crash. Though other troubles may arise as you go from a simple memory manager to a jack up, turret equipped, unit of a memory manager.

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
E - Pickup/Put Memory sticks
Leftclick - Shoot

Made for weekend game jam, Mini Jam 54.

Developed by Alexander Xie
